definition.text: A Position node represents a role within the projectâ€™s organization. However, unlike traditional organizations, positions within Superalgos are open, in the sense that any Contributor may assume any position at any point. If you spend time working in a position, you may produce a Position Claim and rally the Community to support your claim so that you may earn tokens allocated to the said position.

paragraphs.text: You may direct Weight Votes to a Position node to support the particular position.
